note: Seasoned engineer living in Brno, Czech Republic and working in aerospace. Ex-resident of Cambridge, UK. PhD from University of Cambridge. Uses maths for work less and less these days but wishes he had a career in Math. Other interests: philosophy/literature preferably together (Deeply into Robert Musil). Philiosophy of mind and consciousness. Art cinema, great films (Last Year at Marienbad current favourite), books and nature walks. Happily married and father of two great kids.
